title: Ransomware Forensic Data Recovery
description: A critical server has been hit by ransomware, encrypting all files. A forensics analyst must attempt to recover the data without paying the ransom.

tasks.description: Create a forensic image of the encrypted hard drives to work on a copy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully creates a bit-for-bit copy of the affected drives.

tasks.description: Identify the specific strain of ransomware used in the attack.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the ransomware family (e.g., Conti, REvil).

tasks.description: Search for a known public decryptor tool for that ransomware strain. If one exists, use it to attempt to decrypt the files.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst finds a decryptor and successfully recovers a portion of the encrypted files.
